attributes.action: UK campaign to educate people of the danger of Type 1 diabetes and the symptoms
attributes.additional_details:
Two young people have lost their lives this week due to the complications arised from type 1diabetes. Unfortunately there currently is no cure, however, with early diagnosis and treatment a full life can be led.
Anything is possible, you only need to look at our current Prime Minister.

Early diagnosis is key.
attributes.background: Type 1 diabetes is on the rise in the UK with many people not knowing the symptoms or how dangerous late diagnosis can be. A campaign is needed to educate not only parents but anyone who comes into contact with children.
